cab.content: ThU Document is tlr Prpj? !lL.?I I is Britannic Mal03ty'3 government military Secret.1353From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of -State for India, 3rd April 1920.(Received 6th.)4256. Malleson wired 26th March, repeated Tehran, that according to latest reports there are now 10,000 men on Merv-Kushk line. All troops arriving at Merv from East or West go to Kushk or Persian Frontier,.2. Fuel for railway is reported to be very scarce, as supply of saxaul within reach of line practically nearly exhausted.3. Report dated 14th March states that Kerki telegraph line was restored and good progress being made with restoration of railway.
